QueryList.Query: FROM HouseSteward A WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id like '%'||:id||'%' <#else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if steward??> <#if like??> and A.steward like '%'||:steward||'%' <#else> and A.steward=:steward </#if> </#if> <#if house??> <#if like??> and A.house like '%'||:house||'%' <#else> and A.house=:house </#if> </#if>
